name: Widget's Odyssey 2
description:
Exiled from a planet devastated by the Cosmic Sneeze, Spad, Bruce, Cosmo, Helmut and Monk embark on a quest to vanquish the evil Yagor, who, in turn, swore to hunt them down until he's witnessed their complete and total annihilation.

Aboard the S-Pace, our five heroes must once again thwart Yagor’s diabolical plans. In a race against time, they have to defeat hordes of enemies and face mind-blowing dangers. Will they finally succeed in putting an end to Yagor’s despotic hold over the universe? Visit new planets, meet new creatures and play more mini-games as you guide our friends in their quest to save the cosmos.
